notable_quotes: Depends on calculus for Ryan and McConnell who crave continued power above all else and would be thrilled if trump died
The list of officials frequently discussed in the texts who are no longer in their jobs seems to grow by the day

public_knowledge.context: Discusses publicly known Justice Department and FBI personnel changes during Trump administration in 2018, including James Comey firing and Andrew McCabe departure

analysis.summary: Email exchange discussing political analysis of Trump administration, including speculation about Republican leadership motivations and commentary on numerous Justice Department and FBI officials who have left their positions, with reference to media coverage of these developments.
